transcription: Hi guys! Now I'm going to shoot for the Zeru Generation So, follow me! Hi guys! Now I'm ready  I'm ready to shoot for Generasi Zeru I'm going to shoot with Citra and Sotika  My heart is calm when I'm with you You are the answer of my life  Happy New Year! Hi, I'm Regina Putirai. I'm going to sing again.  Jakarta Beatbox They're taking photos for the second song After that, I'll go with them! I don't know if I'll be shooting or not I've been with Citra Skolatika, Gio Idol, and Jakarta Beatbox! Where's Jakarta?  I wouldn't rage for silver or gold I wouldn't rage for inches and toes  Hi guys, I think I'm done with the shooting for Generation Zero. Don't forget to watch Generation Zero. It will be released on December 24th and 25th. So, see you soon! Bye!  you
